claim: The unemployment rate in the US fell to 3.5% in December 2023

sources.title: Bureau of Labor Statistics - Employment Situation
sources.excerpt: The unemployment rate edged down to 3.5 percent in December.

explanation: The claim is accurate according to official BLS data.

claim: Drinking coffee reduces the risk of type 2 diabetes by 30%

sources.title: Coffee consumption and risk of type 2 diabetes: A meta-analysis
sources.excerpt: Coffee consumption was associated with a 30% lower risk of type 2 diabetes.

explanation: Multiple meta-analyses support this claim with similar effect sizes.
